title: About / 关于
content:
Image generated by MYOTee 脸萌 APP

Hello guys！
Welcome to My Personal Website!

  1. Record codes and introductions that are of reuse value in daily review
  2. Record the algorithms and ideas of everyday whims
  3. Record the code and introduction in the process of self-study
  4. Record the code and introduction during the problem solving process
  5. Proactively produce gadgets and highly reusable code to form your own personal code base
  6. The above requirements to do, just write something (๑ • ́ ₃, ̀ ๑)

大家好！
欢迎来到 我的个人网站！

  1. 记录日常复习中带有重复利用价值的代码及介绍
  2. 记录日常突发奇想的算法及想法
  3. 记录自学过程中的代码及介绍
  4. 记录解决难题过程中的代码及介绍
  5. 积极生产小工具和复用性极高的代码以形成自己的个人代码库
  6. 以上要求做不到的话， 就随便写点什么吧 (๑•́ ₃ •̀๑)
